common_issues.title: Ollama Model Download Failure
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing difficulties downloading Ollama models using the Pieces desktop application on Windows. The issue may be related to network connectivity, file permissions, or compatibility problems.  Solutions may involve verifying internet connection, checking firewall settings, ensuring sufficient disk space, or reinstalling the application.

related_issues.title: Models Download Fail
related_issues.text:
Models Download Fail
### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.0.4

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I'm not able to download any of the models for ollama.
[log-02022025.txt](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/18631166/log-02022025.txt)
## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation

**Key Points:**

* User @surya-sengupta created an issue.
* Pieces support bot routed the issue to the appropriate team member.
* Support bot suggested related issues and resources.

**Problems Identified:**

* The issue description is missing, so the specific problem is unclear.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* No solutions proposed or implemented yet.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The issue is being reviewed by the Pieces team.
* No updates provided on the resolution.

**Additional Information:**

* The provided issue conversation only shows the initial message from the support bot. 
* To understand the full context and resolution, more information from the conversation is needed.

recommendations: Investigate the root cause of the "Ollama Model Download Failure" and implement a fix.
Provide clear and detailed instructions or documentation on how to troubleshoot Ollama model downloads.
Consider implementing error logging and monitoring to proactively detect and resolve download issues.
Communicate the resolution of the "Ollama Model Download Failure" to affected users once the issue is fixed.
Monitor user feedback and support tickets for any recurring issues or similar problems with other models or features.
Review and update firewall settings and network configurations to ensure compatibility with Ollama model downloads.
